products.title: JAKA
description: Podosee is the official distributor of JAKA Robotics in Korea
and is dedicated to solving tasks that are difficult for human arms using collaborative robots.

products.title: AI Kiosk
description: Smart solutions for a better everyday life and business.
From photo kiosks to ramen vending machines and fever alarms—discover a variety of solutions all in one place.

products.title: AMR
description: The start of efficient logistics and a smart workplace!

jaka.page_subtitle: JAKA collaborative robots  have been successfully applied to automated production in multiple industrial sectors, providing innovation for industrial sectors with a continuous and powerful equipment foundations.
jaka.feature_title: What make JAKA Cobots great for factory automation
jaka.video_description: With a payload capacity of 3 to 20 kg, a wide working range, and a 6-axis configuration, JAKA collaborative robots bring advanced robotics and seamless human-robot interaction to various industries—including automotive, logistics, electronics, and medical manufacturing—enhancing efficiency and innovation.

description: Equiped with torque-feedback technology to provide accuracy and safety.
Integrated with JAKA Lens 2D camera and advanced self-learning algorithm.
Designed to operate in scenarios with the high protection level requirements.
Ideal for B2C businesses automation. 1 kg payload. Light, compact, and elegant.

id1.name: Remote Monitoring
id1.description:
Monitor the collaborative robot's work and set notifications
 with a unique security authentication system.

id2.name: Wireless Connection
id2.description:
JAKA collaborative robots help create a clean and safe workspace 
without complex wiring.

id3.name: Drag Teaching
id3.description:
With easy drag teaching and six highly flexible joints,
 the robot instantly remembers any position it is moved to.

id4.name: No Teaching Pendant
id4.description:
The JAKA app is available on tablets, smartphones, and PCs.
 Easily and conveniently program your collaborative robot.

id5.name: Graphical Programming
id5.description:
Intuitive graphical programming software requires
 no prior programming experience.
 Anyone can easily set and adjust positions and tasks.

freephoto: It is a free photo printing service device developed in response to the explosive growth of smartphone photography.
It is a proven, innovative advertising medium that attracts attention as a 'marketing platform where customers line up to receive ads.'
feveralarm: Fever Alarm is a QR code-based thermal imaging access control system.
It is a “completely contactless thermal access control system” that allows you to safely check the fever level and record a visit record without contacting
and leave a visit record at the same time without contact.
vendingmachine: The world's first pressure-cooker instant ramen vending machine.
It is a smart vending machine that manages sales information and market conditions in real time,

amr.title: AMR

tseries: THIRA AMRs are all equipped with next-generation drive technology
and can carry payloads ranging from 200 kg (441 lbs)-1,000 kg (2,205 lbs) to perfectly fit into your end-to-end robotics solution.
lseries: THIRA AMRs are all equipped with next-generation drive technology
and can carry payloads ranging from 200 kg (441 lbs)-1,000 kg (2,205 lbs) to perfectly fit into your end-to-end robotics solution.

lseries_description: The L200 can carry a maximum of 200kg of cargo.

This model has a ground clearance of 170mm, making it compatible with existing low-height trolleys without the need for replacement. Additionally, it can smoothly pass through congested and narrow passages with heavy traffic.

company.title: Company

greeting.item2: Podosee is a place where people with different backgrounds and experiences come together.
greeting.item3: However, we all look in the same direction.
greeting.item4: In that environment, we are working together to achieve our dreams.
greeting.item6: Podosee corporate ideology can contribute to everyone by freely expressing individual thoughts.
greeting.item7: It is about creating opportunities to thank the world by providing goods and services.
greeting.item8: We will increase the value of life and pursue happiness in the changing times.
greeting.item9: We will grow with our best effort.
greeting.item10: I wish everyone who visited the website good health and good luck.

company.location: ADDRESS 709, 10, Seonyu-ro 9-gil, Yeongdeungpo-gu, Seoul (Mullae SK V1 Center)

alerts.agree_required: You must agree to the collection and use of personal information.

privacy_policy.company_info: Podosee.inc (hereinafter referred to as 'the company') adheres to the Personal Information Protection Act to protect the privacy and rights of users and to facilitate the resolution of any issues related to personal information.
privacy_policy.company_policy_update: Podosee.inc (hereinafter referred to as 'the company') will notify users of any updates to the privacy policy through website notices (or individual notices).
privacy_policy.policy_effective_date: This policy is effective from July 4, 2022.
privacy_policy.company_privacy_content: The company's privacy policy includes the following contents:
privacy_policy.item2: 2. Purpose of collection and use of personal information
privacy_policy.item3: 3. Retention and use period of personal information
privacy_policy.item4: 4. Procedures and methods of personal information destruction
privacy_policy.item7: 7. Rights of users and legal representatives and how to exercise them
privacy_policy.item8: 8. Installation, operation, and refusal of automatic personal information collection devices
privacy_policy.item1_explanation1: This site allows free access to content without a separate membership registration process. However, personal information is collected only when users leave inquiries with the company. The personal information collected by the company is as follows:
privacy_policy.item1_explanation2: (Podosee, hereinafter referred to as 'the company') collects personal information as follows for product inquiries and other purposes.
privacy_policy.item1_explanation4: ① Product inquiry - Items collected: Name, Contact, Company name, Email
privacy_policy.item1_explanation5: ② During the process of using internet services, the following personal information may be automatically generated and collected: - IP address, Cookies, MAC address, Service usage records, Visit records, Improper usage records, etc.
privacy_policy.item2_explanation1: The company processes collected personal information for the following purposes. The personal information being processed will not be used for purposes other than the following, and if the purpose of use is changed, the company will take necessary steps such as obtaining separate consent in accordance with Article 18 of the Personal Information Protection Act.
privacy_policy.item2_explanation3: ① Personal information is processed for the purpose of contacting and notifying users, and communicating processing results in response to inquiries.
privacy_policy.item3_explanation1: In principle, personal information will be destroyed without delay after the purpose of collection and use has been achieved. However, if retention is necessary under relevant laws, the company will retain the personal information for a certain period as stipulated by the laws.
privacy_policy.item3_explanation3: ① Retention reason: Act on Promotion of Information and Communications Network Utilization and Information Protection
privacy_policy.item3_explanation6: ① Retention reason: Communications Privacy Protection Act
privacy_policy.item4_explanation1: The company will destroy personal information without delay after the purpose of collection and use has been achieved. The procedures and methods of destruction are as follows:
privacy_policy.item4_explanation3: Information entered by users during membership registration will be moved to a separate database (or separate filing cabinet for paper documents) and will be stored for a certain period according to internal policies and related legal requirements before being destroyed. The personal information moved to the separate database will not be used for any other purposes unless required by law.
privacy_policy.item4_explanation5: Personal information stored in electronic file form will be deleted using technical methods that prevent recovery of records.
privacy_policy.item5_explanation1: The company generally does not provide users' personal information to third parties. However, the following are exceptions:
privacy_policy.item5_explanation2: ① If the user has given prior consent
privacy_policy.item5_explanation3: ② If required by law or requested by law enforcement authorities under the prescribed procedures for investigation purposes
privacy_policy.item6_explanation1: The company does not outsource users' personal information to external parties without their consent.
privacy_policy.item6_explanation2: If such outsourcing becomes necessary in the future, the company will notify the user of the outsourcing target and the scope of outsourcing and will obtain prior consent if necessary.
privacy_policy.item7_explanation1: Users can view or modify their registered personal information at any time.
privacy_policy.item7_explanation2: To view or modify personal information, users should contact the Personal Information Management Officer via written or email request, and the company will take prompt action.
privacy_policy.item7_explanation3: If a user requests correction of erroneous personal information, the company will not use or provide the information until the correction is completed.
privacy_policy.item7_explanation4: If erroneous personal information has already been provided to a third party, the company will promptly notify the third party of the correction and ensure the correction is made.
privacy_policy.item7_explanation5: Personal information that has been deleted or terminated by a user's request will be processed in accordance with the 'Retention and Use Period of Personal Information' and will not be used for any other purpose.
privacy_policy.item8_explanation1: The company uses cookies and other devices to store and retrieve your information periodically. A cookie is a small text file sent from the company's server to your browser, which is stored on your computer's hard disk. The company uses cookies for the following purposes:
privacy_policy.item8_explanation2: ① Purpose of using cookies: Analyzing the frequency and duration of visits, identifying users' preferences and areas of interest, tracking user behavior, and providing targeted marketing and personalized services.
privacy_policy.item8_explanation3: ② How to reject cookies: Users can set their web browser options to allow all cookies, confirm each time cookies are stored, or reject all cookies.
privacy_policy.item9_explanation1: The company has designated a Personal Information Management Officer to protect users' personal information and handle complaints related to personal information.
privacy_policy.item9_explanation2: ① Personal Information Protection Officer: CEO Mo Shin-Hee
privacy_policy.item9_explanation4: Users can report any personal information protection-related complaints to the Personal Information Management Officer. The company will provide prompt and sufficient responses to the complaints.
privacy_policy.item9_explanation5: For other personal information violations, users can contact the following institutions:
privacy_policy.item9_explanation9: 4. National Police Agency Cyber Safety Division (www.ctrc.go.kr / 1566-0112)
privacy_policy.item10_explanation1: This 'Privacy Policy' does not apply to the personal information collection practices of external websites linked to the homepage.
privacy_policy.item11_explanation1: In the event that this privacy policy is changed, users will be notified at least 7 days prior to the changes via the homepage.
